com.example.bot.spring

Interface StorageEngine

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PSQLDatabaseEngine

    public interface StorageEngine
    This interface sets the methods our classes that communicate with Databases will implement

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addBooking(TourBooking tourBooking)
      this method will add a booking made by a customer in the DB

      This method will add a new customer to the DB

      This method will serve to get details about a specific customer

      this method will serve to get details about a tour (not according to the date)

    • Method Detail

      • getFAQResponse

        java.lang.String getFAQResponse(java.lang.String quesion)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will be used to fetch the answers to a FAQ from the database
        Parameters:
        quesion - the question we want to ask
        Returns:
        a String that serves as an answer to that question if it is stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the question is not present in the database

      • getTourDetails

        Tour getTourDetails(java.lang.String id,
                    java.util.Date date)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will serve to fetch the details of a specific tour that is stored in the database
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the tour
        date - the date at which the tour will take place
        Returns:
        a instance of Tour with the information we need
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the id/date of the tour do not correspond to any entries in the database

      • getCustomerDetails

        Customer getCustomerDetails(java.lang.String identifier)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        This method will serve to get details about a specific customer
        Parameters:
        identifier - the String that identifies the customer
        Returns:
        a customer instance if the customer is stored in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the identifier is not present in the database

      • getGeneralTourDetails

        GeneralTour getGeneralTourDetails(java.lang.String name)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        this method will serve to get details about a tour (not according to the date)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the tour
        Returns:
        a instance of GeneralTour
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case name of the tour is not in the database

      • getTourDates

        java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Date> getTourDates(java.lang.String identifier)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        this method will serve to get the list of dates for a tour specified by its id
        Parameters:
        identifier - the id of the tour
        Returns:
        an array of Dates
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the tour is not in the DB

      • getNotPaidCustomers

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getNotPaidCustomers(java.util.Date date)
                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        this method will serve to get a list of the customers who have not paid for tours on a specific date
        Parameters:
        date - the date
        Returns:
        an array of ids of customer who still have to pay
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if there is no tour for the specified date

      • logQuestion

        void logQuestion(java.lang.String question)
        This method will serve to log the questions of the users in the DB
        Parameters:
        question - the question the user asked

      • addBooking

        void addBooking(TourBooking tourBooking)
         throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        this method will add a booking made by a customer in the DB
        Parameters:
        tourBooking - the booking
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the fields are in an incorrect format

      • addCustomer

        void addCustomer(Customer customer)
          throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        This method will add a new customer to the DB
        Parameters:
        customer - the customer we want to add
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - if the fields are in an incorrect format

      • getNumberBookedTours

        int getNumberBookedTours(Tour tour)
        this method will return the number of bookings made for a tour
        Parameters:
        tour - the tour we want to know the number of bookings for
        Returns:
        the number of bookings made
